short_summary: Trailer Spare Parts for remtoke of miliary type container
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
### Request for Proposal (RFP) for Trailer Spare Parts
#### solicitationNumber: W8486-259936/A

The Government of Canada is seeking proposals for the procurement of trailer spare parts. The purpose of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is to acquire a variety of parts for trailers, including range outfits, chain assemblies, plugs, lamps, hooks, nuts, air shutters, orifices, and nipples.

#### deliveryLocations:
- 25 Canadian Forces Support Unit (25 CFSD) Montreal, Quebec
- 7 Canadian Forces Support Unit (7 CFSD) Edmonton, Alberta

#### Delivery Deadlines:
- 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec: March 31, 2025
- 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta: March 31, 2025

#### procurementMethod: Competitive - Open bidding

#### selectionCriteria: Lowest Price

Bidders must submit a proposal in response to this RFP, including the following information:

- Part numbers
- NSN (part/vehicle identification numbers)
- Contracts Surface Mantee Company (weapons and or its logo detail) and or Cage numbers

The Government of Canada may negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Debriefings may be provided in writing, by telephone, or in person.

#### Tender Submissions:

Electronic submissions of bids are required. For details, please review the Electronic Submission of Bids section in the solicitation document. Bids must be submitted by email to:

- DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca

Attachments:

A PDF attachment containing the solicitation details may be found at the following link:
- English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52342/ott_lstl-7223238-v1-w8486-259936_frp_en.pdf
- French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52342/ott_lstl-7223235-v1-w8486-259936_frp_fr_0.pdf

Please review the attached solicitation document for additional information and instruction on how to submit your bid. The Government of Canada is committed to open and transparent procurement processes. Please do not hesitate to contact the contracting authority if you require further information.

Contracting Authority Information
- Name: Josianne Lafrenière
- Email: josianne.l
